data.actual_result: Able to move server with the screen
data.expected_result: Shouldn’t be Able to move server
data.short_description: Able to move Server Icon when Join/Create Server options are present
data.steps_to_repro: - Press on the + to create/join a server - Quickly hold down on any server to move it  (May take a few attempts)  - Notice how able to re order server while in the Create/join server screen
